mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_event (user_id, review_id, place_id, content_point, image_point, first_point, action) VALUES (#{userId}, #{reviewId}, #{placeId}, #{contentPoint}, #{imagePoint}, #{firstPoint}, #{action})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, review_id, place_id, content_point, image_point, first_point, action, created_at FROM review_event WHERE place_id = #{placeId} AND user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, user_id, review_id, place_id, content_point, image_point, first_point, action, created_at FROM review_event WHERE place_id = #{placeId} AND first_point != 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
